LanguageData.AC.InstallStackDesc: Select a pawn or empty sleeve to implant the neural stack into via surgery. The surgery bill will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.InstallEmptyStackDesc: Select a pawn to implant the empty neural stack in via surgery. The surgery bill will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.InstallArchotechStackDesc: Select a pawn or empty sleeve to implant the archotech stack in via surgery. The surgery bill will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.InstallEmptyArchotechStackDesc: Select a pawn to implant the empty archotech stack in via surgery. The surgery bill will automatically be created in the health tab of the selected pawn or sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.AutoLoadDesc: If active, haulers will automatically store this stack in a stack cache or neural matrix.
LanguageData.AC.DestroyStackConfirmation: Destroying stack:\nWARNING! You are about to destroy this stack. Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.AC.ScenPart_PawnsHaveNeuralStack: {0} have a {1} chance of starting with a {2}.
LanguageData.AC.PawnAlreadyHasStack: {PAWN_nameDef} already has a neural stack installed!
LanguageData.AC.PawnAlreadyHasArchotechStack: {PAWN_nameDef} already has an archotech stack installed!
LanguageData.AC.PawnStackCannotDowngrade: {PAWN_nameDef} already has an archotech stack installed!
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallStackNeckIsMissingOrAnot: Cannot install neural stack - neck is missing or another implant is already present.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyMarkedForInstalling: Stack is already marked for implantation.
LanguageData.AC.PawnDiedOfImplantingStack: {PAWN_nameDef} has been overwritten by a neural stack.
LanguageData.AC.StartNeedlecastingDesc: Select a traget with a neural reciver to needlecast to.
LanguageData.AC.CurrentDistanceToCastingOrigin: Current distance to casting origin: {0} tiles
LanguageData.AC.CaravanNeedlecastingIconTooltip: {0} is currently needlecasting into this sleeve. If they travel beyond their casting range will automatically be ended and they might be lost.\n\nMaximum needlecasting range: {1} tiles
LanguageData.AC.NeedlecastingDisconnectWarning:
Do your really want to end the {0}'s needlecasting connection?
{0} is currently not on your colonies local map. The sleeve {0} is connected to might be lost if there are no other colonists on the same local map as them.
LanguageData.AC.WasRemovedFromCryptoCasket: {0} was removed from the crypto casket.
LanguageData.AC.MessageMustDesignateHasStack: Must designate corpses with stacks installed.
LanguageData.AC.TakeToSleeveCasketOrMedicalBed: Take empty sleeve to sleeve casket or medical bed.
LanguageData.AC.CannotTakeToSleeveCasketOrMedicalBed: Cannot take: No reachable, un-reserved sleeve casket or medical bed in safe temperature.
LanguageData.AC.CreateSleeveBodyDesc: Create a new baseliner or xenotype sleeve using available xenogerms.
LanguageData.AC.XenogermExplanation: Selected xenogerm will be consumed in the process. If no xenogerm is selected, the sleeve will be grown as a "Baseliner".
LanguageData.AC.GeneOptionsExplanation: Available options depend on the genes of the selected xenogerm. Chosen options will be used as active genes, while conflicting ones will be dormant.
LanguageData.AC.BodyOptionsExplanation: Baseliner skins and hair colour options are always available. Chosen options will be used as active genes, while conflicting ones will be dormant.
LanguageData.AC.ConvertGenesToGermline: Grow non-archotech genes in xenogerm as germline genes:
LanguageData.AC.PowerSleeveWillBeLostIn: Due to lack of power, the sleeve will be lost in {0}.
LanguageData.AC.FuelSleeveWillBeLostIn: Due to lack of neutroamine, the sleeve will be lost in {0}.
LanguageData.AC.FuelSleeveWillBeDeteriorated: Due to lack of neutroamine, the sleeve will begin to deteriorate in {0}
LanguageData.AC.FuelSleeveIsDeteriorating: Due to lack of neutroamine, the sleeve is deteriorating.
LanguageData.AC.SleeveCustomizationExplanation: When you press Accept, a sleeve will begin growing in this Sleeve gestator. During growth, it will require a constant power connection as well as neutroamine connection via neutro pipes. When the timer finishes, a Sleeve can be extracted and either used straight-away, or inserted into a Sleeve casket.
LanguageData.AC.CloneSleeveDesc: Create a sleeve based on an existing pawn, including endogenes.
LanguageData.AC.IsRunningOutFuel: Sleeve gestator is running out neutroamine
LanguageData.AC.IsRunningOutPower: Sleeve gestator is running out power
LanguageData.AC.SleeveIngestatorIsDead: Sleeve body in the gestator is dead
LanguageData.AC.RepurposeCorpseDesc: Repurpose a not fully rotten corpse and turn it into an empty sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.CancelRepurposingCorpseDesc: Cancel repurposing corpse into a empty sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.NeuralStackMustBeRemovedFirst: Neural stack must be removed first.
LanguageData.AC.CannotRepurposeCorspeWithoutHead: Cannot repurpose corpse with missing head.
LanguageData.AC.SleeveDesignCouldntBeFullyLoaded: Saved Sleeve Design could not be fully loaded. Missing required xenogerm!
LanguageData.AC.PawnBodyCouldntBeFullyCopied: A {PAWN_nameDef} body couldn't be copied fully. The following xenogenes were skipped: {1}
LanguageData.AC.ManageNeuralMatrixDesc: Manage stacks stored or registered with the neural matrix.
LanguageData.AC.TooltipImplantStack: Implant {0} into an empty sleeve. The stack will stay registered with the neural matrix and will continue to be tracked.
LanguageData.AC.TooltipRemoveStack: Drop stack onto the ground. The stack will stay registered with the neural matrix and will continue to be tracked.
LanguageData.AC.TooltipStopManaging: Unregister {0}. It will still be stored inside the neural matrix storage, but no longer be tracked.
LanguageData.AC.TooltipNeedlecast: Needlecast {0} into any sleeve with an installed neural reciver. The stack will not be removed from the neural matrix.
LanguageData.AC.EjectAllNeuralStacksDesc: Drop all contained stacks onto the ground.
LanguageData.AC.EjectNeuralStackTooltip: Eject this stack from the matrix.
LanguageData.AC.EjectNeuralStackConfirmation: Do you really want to eject {0}? It will be immediately ejected onto the ground nearby.
LanguageData.AC.EraseNeuralStackConfirmation: Do you really want to erase {0}? It will be immediately destroyed.
LanguageData.AC.EjectStackTooltip: Eject this stack from the stack cache.
LanguageData.AC.EjectStackConfirmation: Do you really want to eject {0}? It will be immediately ejected onto the ground nearby.
LanguageData.AC.RelationshipsUnavailable: Relationships of {0} unavailable. \n\nStack must be sleeved or needlecasting to show relationships.
LanguageData.AC.NeedsUnavailable: Needs of {0} unavailable. \n\nStack must be sleeved or needlecasting to show needs.
LanguageData.AC.CuirassierBeltTooltip: A cuirassier belt that will attempt to stop incoming projectiles or shrapnel, while not preventing the wearer from firing out. Just like a regular shield belt, it is susceptible to EMP.\n\nCuirassier do not recharge themselves, rather they need to be manually fed from a power grid, like batteries, rechargers or exposed conduits.
LanguageData.AC.NoConnectedMatrix: Cannot use: No Neural Matrix nearby.
LanguageData.AC.ConnectedMatrixHasNoPower: Cannot use: Connected Neural Matrix is not powered.
LanguageData.AC.WipingFriendlyStackWarning:
Warning: The stack you are trying to factory reset does not belong to your faction.
If you erase the content from a non-colonist stack from another faction, their entire faction may become your enemy.
LanguageData.AC.DuplicatingFriendlyStackWarning:
Warning: The stack you are trying to duplicate does not belong to your faction.
If you make a copy of the content from a non-colonist stack from another faction, their entire faction may become your enemy.
LanguageData.AC.EditingFriendlyStackWarning:
The stack you are trying to edit does not belong to your faction.
If you edit the content from a non-colonist stack from another faction, their entire faction may become your enemy.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToWipeStack: This stack is set for reseting already on a neural editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToEditStack: This stack is set for editing already on a neural editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToDuplicateStack: This stack is set for duplicating already on a neural editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToRestoreStack: This stack is set for restoring already on a neural editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyOrderedToResetBiocodedThing: This biocoded thing is set for resetting already on a neural editor. Remove the bill in order to add new operation on it.
LanguageData.AC.ResettingBiocodedSuccess: Resetting biocoded equipment: Successful! {0} is unlocked.
LanguageData.AC.NeuralStackEditExplanation: Neural Stacks feature advanced encryption to prevent outside forces from messing with the stored consciousness. Known exploits allow for some data to be edited and rewritten at the cost of stack degradation.
LanguageData.AC.ChangingPawnIdeologyWarning: Changing a pawn ideology will also remove any roles assosiated from them.
LanguageData.AC.Tutorial: WARNING: The more you edit, the higher the stack degradation will be, causing the stored pawns neurallity to become more and more unstable. Stack degradation will go away over time after being installed in a body, but can take years.
LanguageData.AC.CancelStackDuplicationDesc: Cancel duplication of stored neural stack.
LanguageData.AC.EnableStackSpawningDesc: If disabled, Neural Stacks and Archostacks will NOT spawn on any pawns. You can still craft them, get them as rewards or trade for them.
LanguageData.AC.EnableTechstackRequirement: Enable techstack requirements in research projects
LanguageData.AC.TimeToGrowSleeveMultiplierDesc: Multiplicator of the overall time needed to grow a new sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.CostToGrowSleeveMultiplierDesc: Multiplicator of the overall neutroamine cost needed to grow a new sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.EnableStackDegradationDesc: If disabled, Neural Stacks can be edited to your heart's content without having to worry about stack degradation.
LanguageData.AC.StackEditEditTimeValueMultiplierDesc: Multiplicator of the overall stack editing time.
LanguageData.AC.StackEditDegradationValueMultiplierDe: Multiplies the overall stack degradation that is accumulated through editing.
LanguageData.AC.EnableArchostackEditingDesc: Allows you to edit the content of Archo Stacks.
LanguageData.AC.ColonistStackNeedsExtractingDesc:
These colonists are incapacitated on the ground:

{0}
Send another colonist to rescue them and carry them back to bed.

(To rescue, select another colonist, then right click on the victim and select Rescue.)
LanguageData.AC.SleeveDeathDoesNotCauseGearTainting: Sleeve death doesn't cause gear to be tainted
LanguageData.AC.EnableSoldNeuralStacksCreatingPawnDup: Selling neural stacks can create duplicates
LanguageData.AC.EnableNeuralStacksInAncientDangers: Enable neural stacks spawning in ancient dangers
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallStackOnAndroidWithoutNeu: Cannot install stacks into androids without a neural module.
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallEmptyStackInEmptySleeve: Cannot install an empty stack into an empty sleeve.
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallStackInBodyOfThisRace: Cannot install stacks into this race: {0}.
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallActiveStackInChildren: Cannot install an active stack into children.
LanguageData.AC.CannotInstallAlreadyHaveStack: Cannot install stack: Already has a stack installed.
LanguageData.AC.TriggeredMentalFuseText: {PAWN_nameDef}'s mental fuse has triggered, preventing a mental break.
LanguageData.AC.MentalFuseTraumaText: {PAWN_nameDef}'s mental fuse has caused permanent damage in {PAWN_objective} brain. This damage has caused {PAWN_objective} to develop strange savant-like abilities.
LanguageData.AC.CreatingSkilltrainerCompleted: Creating skilltrainer completed for {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_nameDef}'s brain has been destroyed by the neural connector.
LanguageData.AC.ConfirmCancelSkilltrainerPawn: Cancelling a skilltrainer process will still kill {PAWN_nameDef}. Are you sure you want to continue?
LanguageData.AC.AlreadyRegisteredToMatrix: Already registered selected the neural matrix
LanguageData.AC.RegisteringStackCompleted: Stack of {PAWN_nameDef} successfully registered with neural matrix.
LanguageData.AC.MessagePawnKilledNeuralConnector: {PAWN_nameDef}'s brain has been destroyed by the neural connector.
LanguageData.AC.BiocodableEquipWarning: Once imprinted to a user, the weapon can not be used by anyone else until its biocoding is reset again. Are you sure you want to equip this time?
